p2.title: Welcome to NoneOS
p2.desc1: A browser-based desktop operating system that connects all your devices together.
p2.desc2: Secure, simple and easy to use.
p2.closeAlert: Thank you for your support, goodbye. (If the window does not close, please close it manually)

install_os.failed_get_sign_list: Unable to get valid signature list
